itunes:title: #132: Asking for What You Need Emotionally in Friendships
title: #132: Asking for What You Need Emotionally in Friendships
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: To maintain safety and love with your relationships, it's important for you to know how to ask for what you need emotionalyl when sharing with your friends and how to repair when there's a disruption. Let's talk about what that looks like in today's...
itunes:summary:
To maintain safety and love with your relationships, it's important for you to know how to ask for what you need emotionalyl when sharing with your friends and how to repair when there's a disruption. Let's talk about what that looks like in today's episode!

 

RESOURCES MENTIONED

  • Join our weekly text inspiration list by texting PODCAST to 832-219-7815
  • Enroll in our Signature Program for single and partnered women: From Addicted & Avoidant to Available
